edu.txstate.pos.storage

Class UserRemoteStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.txstate.pos.storage.RemoteStorage
      • edu.txstate.pos.storage.UserRemoteStorage

  • public class UserRemoteStorage
extends RemoteStorage
    Management of remote User objects. Includes login. See user.pl for server side.

      • login

        public User login(User user)
           throws ConnectionError,
                  NoUserFoundException,
                  BadPasswordException
        Uses the login and password in the given User object and attempts to login. If the login is successful, then the User object is returned populated with the current user's settings. Otherwise, an exception is thrown.
        Parameters:
        user -
        Returns:
        A populated User object
        Throws:
        ConnectionError
        NoUserFoundException
        BadPasswordException

      • add

        public User add(User user)
         throws ConnectionError,
                UserExistsException
        Adds a User to the system if the login doesn't already exist.
        Parameters:
        user - The User to add
        Returns:
        The same User object with the User ID populated
        Throws:
        ConnectionError
        UserExistsException

      • delete

        public void delete(java.lang.String login)
            throws ConnectionError,
                   NoUserFoundException
        Deletes the user associated with the given login.
        Parameters:
        login - The login to delete.
        Throws:
        ConnectionError
        NoUserFoundException

      • update

        public void update(User user)
            throws ConnectionError,
                   NoUserFoundException
        Update the given User. The ID of the User is used to find the user to update, if it exists. The the ID isn't given, then the login is used.
        Parameters:
        user - The User to update.
        Throws:
        ConnectionError
        NoUserFoundException

      • getAll

        public java.util.List<User> getAll()
                            throws ConnectionError
        Gets all of the users - active or inactive.
        Returns:
        A List of all the users.
        Throws:
        ConnectionError
